plugin.name: Sensei
plugin.description: A wrapper around several plugins that may be of use to beginners
plugin.longdescription: This plugin installs the following plugins: Annotator, Architecture Reference, Binja Dynamic Analysis Tools, Explain Instruction, Syscaller
